p: The obtained results are expressed as the mean ± standard deviation of a minimum three replicates in independent experiments. The data were analyzed by one-way analysis of variance followed by Tukey’s test for the comparison of multiple independent variables using GraphPad Prism v.5.0 for Windows (GraphPad Software, Inc., La Jolla, CA, USA). P<0.05 was considered to indicate a statistically significant difference.
